column5: My place is close to the Anahuac Wildlife Refuge. Youâ€™ll love my place because of clean, comfortable beds, quiet neighborhood, waterfront, bird watching, full kitchen, washer and dryer, gorgeous views of Trinity Bay and fantastic sunsets, and great fishing, 300 foot pier.
